svg:

"DSC - 'Desired State Configuration'"Kubernetes Concepts- "Cluster" - we treat a bunch machines as if it were one. - "Nodes" - machines that are assimilated into the k8s borg.- Nodes have two different roles in K8S - Some nodes are the "Control Plane" - at least 3 computers become the control plane. - Api - HTTP API that we post JSON documents. - It writes to a database (etcd) - Scheduler gets busy. - The rest are "Workers"The "Thing" that we deploy to a node is a "POD" - At least one, usually one, but maybe 2 or more containers that will be deployed together to a node. - A node will have lots of pods running on it. Each pod is it's own "localhost"Create Pods by creating a K8s called a "Deployment"- implictly defines a pod,- but also sets it up so that it can be monitored.
